name: MochiMochi
description: Help Suama stretch and zoom through four bite sized dessert inspired worlds in an effort to finally reunite with her love Mochi! With a simple one button control scheme MochiMochi provides an ever-increasing level of challenge throughout its short and welcoming 2D adventure. Go and get those kisses!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2.00 GHz processor or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 150 MB available space
